verses.verse: Then <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H6030>answered,<s%>
"I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H428>such<s%> <S%H7227>things;<s%> <S%H5999>Sorry<s%> <S%H5162>comforters<s%> are you <S%H3605>all.<s%>
"Is there [no] <S%H7093>limit<s%> to <S%H7307>windy<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%>? <S%H176>Or<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H4834>plagues<s%> you that you <S%H6030>answer<s%>?

"I <S%H1571>too<s%> could <S%H1696>speak<s%> like you, <S%H3863>If<s%> I were in your <S%H8478>place.<s%> I could <S%H2266>compose<s%> <S%H4405>words<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you, And <S%H5128>shake<s%> my <S%H7218>head<s%> at you.
"I could <S%H553>strengthen<s%> you with my <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> And the <S%H5205>solace<s%> of my <S%H8193>lips<s%> could <S%H2820>lessen<s%> [your pain.]
<S%H518>"If<s%> I <S%H1696>speak,<s%> my <S%H3511>pain<s%> is not <S%H2820>lessened,<s%> And if I <S%H2308>hold<s%> <S%H2308>back,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> has <S%H1980>left<s%> me?
"But <S%H6258>now<s%> He has <S%H3811>exhausted<s%> me; Thou hast <S%H8074>laid<s%> <S%H8074>waste<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H5712>company.<s%>

"And Thou hast <S%H7059>shriveled<s%> me up, It has <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H5707>witness;<s%> And my <S%H3585>leanness<s%> <S%H6965>rises<s%> up against me, It <S%H6030>testifies<s%> to my <S%H6440>face.<s%>

"His <S%H639>anger<s%> has <S%H2963>torn<s%> me and <S%H7852>hunted<s%> me <S%H7852>down,<s%> He has <S%H2786>gnashed<s%> at me with His <S%H8127>teeth;<s%> My <S%H6862>adversary<s%> <S%H3913>glares<s%> <S%H5869><s%> at me.

"They have <S%H6473>gaped<s%> at me with their <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> They have <S%H5221>slapped<s%> me on the <S%H3895>cheek<s%> with <S%H2781>contempt;<s%> They have <S%H4390>massed<s%> themselves <S%H5921>against<s%> me.
<S%H410>"God<s%> <S%H5462>hands<s%> me <S%H5462>over<s%> to <S%H5760>ruffians,<s%> And <S%H3399>tosses<s%> me into the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>

"I was at <S%H7961>ease,<s%> but He <S%H6565>shattered<s%> me, And He has <S%H270>grasped<s%> me by the <S%H6203>neck<s%> and <S%H9455>shaken<s%> me to <S%H9455>pieces;<s%> He has also <S%H6965>set<s%> me up as His <S%H4307>target.<s%>

"His <S%H7228>arrows<s%> <S%H5437>surround<s%> me. <S%H3808>Without<s%> <S%H2550>mercy<s%> He <S%H6398>splits<s%> my <S%H3629>kidneys<s%> <S%H6398>open;<s%> He <S%H8210>pours<s%> out my <S%H4845>gall<s%> on the <S%H776>ground.<s%>
"He <S%H6555>breaks<s%> <S%H6555>through<s%> me with <S%H6556>breach<s%> <S%H5921>after<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H6556>breach;<s%> He <S%H7323>runs<s%> at me like a <S%H1368>warrior.<s%>
"I have <S%H8609>sewed<s%> <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> my <S%H1539>skin,<s%> And <S%H9414>thrust<s%> my <S%H7161>horn<s%> in the <S%H6083>dust.<s%>
"My <S%H6440>face<s%> is <S%H9147>flushed<s%> from <S%H1065>weeping,<s%> And <S%H6757>deep<s%> <S%H6757>darkness<s%> is on my <S%H6079>eyelids,<s%>
<S%H5921>Although<s%> there is <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2555>violence<s%> in my <S%H3709>hands,<s%> And my <S%H8605>prayer<s%> is <S%H2134>pure.<s%>
"O <S%H776>earth,<s%> do not <S%H3680>cover<s%> my <S%H1818>blood,<s%> And let there be <S%H408>no<s%> [resting] <S%H4725>place<s%> for my <S%H2201>cry.<s%>
<S%H1571>"Even<s%> <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> my <S%H5707>witness<s%> is in <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> And my <S%H7717>advocate<s%> is on <S%H4791>high.<s%>
"My <S%H7453>friends<s%> are my <S%H9238>scoffers;<s%> My <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H1811>weeps<s%> to <S%H433>God.<s%>
"O that a <S%H1397>man<s%> might <S%H3198>plead<s%> with <S%H433>God<s%> As a <S%H1121>man<s%> <S%H120><s%> with his <S%H7453>neighbor!<s%>
"For when a <S%H4557>few<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> are <S%H857>past,<s%> I shall <S%H1980>go<s%> the <S%H734>way<s%> of <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7725>return.<s%>
